pages.text: $(li)Crows are noisy birds that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/forest)Forests$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/grass/plains)Plains$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)These creatures are considered pests since they can ofter be found circling fields and damaging crop growth.$(br)$(li)You can place a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Carved Pumpkin$(/l) to scare them away.

$(li)Crows can be tamed by throwing them some $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin_seeds)Pumpkin Seeds$(/l).$(br)$(li)These tamed birds have multiple uses like made to sit, wander, follow or gather items.$(br)$(li)You can heal your tamed crow making it to sit on a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/hay_bale)Hay Bale$(/l).

$(li)When a crow gather items, it will place it in the nearest cointainer, like a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) with an $(l:patchouli:decoration/quark/item_frame)Item Frame$(/l) on it matching the held item.
